body_html:
On MacOSX, I first upgraded java to Java8, and then installed Bazel.

I've also prepared Android Example building environment with AndroidStudio and NDK, without Bazel.
https://github.com/miyosuda/TensorFlowAndroidDemo
If you would like to quickly try Android Example, it might help.

body:
On MacOSX, I first upgraded java to Java8, and then installed Bazel.

I've also prepared Android Example building environment with AndroidStudio and NDK, without Bazel.
https://github.com/miyosuda/TensorFlowAndroidDemo
If you would like to quickly try Android Example, it might help.
